amendment.description: To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Air Force and Operation and Maintenance, Air National Guard $45,000,000 for payments to local water authorities and States for treatment of certain acids in drinking water as a result of Air Force-supported activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3981 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
